SA10n1016:2: gataṃ na gamyate tāvadagataṃ naiva gamyate |
SA10n1016:4: ceṣṭā yatra gatistatra gamyamāne ca sā yataḥ |
SA10n1016:5: na gate nāgate ceṣṭā gamyamāne gatistataḥ ||2 ||
SA10n1016:11: yena tadgamyamānaṃ ca yaccātra gamanaṃ punaḥ ||5 ||
SA10n1016:16: gantā na gacchati tāvadagantā naiva gacchati |
SA10n1016:20: pakṣo gantā gacchatīti yasya tasya prasajyate |
SA10n1016:22: gamane dve prasajyete gantā yadyuta gacchati |
SA10n1016:23: ganteti cocyate yena gantā san yacca gacchati ||11 ||
SA10n1016:26: na pūrvaṃ gamanārambhādgamyamānaṃ na vā gatam |
SA10n1016:28: gataṃ kiṃ gamyamānaṃ kimagataṃ kiṃ vikalpyate |
SA10n1016:30: gantā na tiṣṭhati tāvadagantā naiva tiṣṭhati |
SA10n1016:36: yadeva gamanaṃ gantā sa eveti na yujyate |
SA10n1016:37: anya eva punargantā gateriti na yujyate ||18 ||
SA10n1016:38: yadeva gamanaṃ gantā sa eva hi bhavedyadi |
SA10n1016:39: ekībhāvaḥ prasajyeta kartuḥ karmaṇa eva ca ||19 ||
SA10n1016:43: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate ||21 ||
SA10n1016:44: gatyā yayocyate gantā gatiṃ tāṃ sa na gacchati |
SA10n1016:46: gatyā yayocyate gantā tato'nyāṃ sa na gacchati |
SA10n1016:48: sadbhūto gamanaṃ gantā triprakāraṃ na gacchati |
SA10n1016:51: tasmādgatiśca gantā ca gantavyaṃ ca na vidyate ||25 ||
